about_the_game:
This DLC adds the DOS Version to your Lizard installation. You can use this to play the game on a DOS machine, or emulator such as DOSBox.

Required:
  • DOS
  • 386 or better CPU
  • 4MB RAM
Recommended:
  • 486 or better CPU
  • SoundBlaster
  • 4-Button Joystick

The downloaded files can be found in the application's "local files" (see properties) in the DOS folder.
detailed_description:
This DLC adds the DOS Version to your Lizard installation. You can use this to play the game on a DOS machine, or emulator such as DOSBox.

Required:
  • DOS
  • 386 or better CPU
  • 4MB RAM
Recommended:
  • 486 or better CPU
  • SoundBlaster
  • 4-Button Joystick

The downloaded files can be found in the application's "local files" (see properties) in the DOS folder.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later recommended, 32-bit or 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

name: Lizard DOS Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz (SSE2)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: A version of Lizard that you can play on a DOS machine.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
